00115                         Value(std::string json) throw (Json::Exception)
00116                         {

00128                                 switch (this->type) {
00129                                 case JVOBJECT:
00130                                         this->deleteObject(this->asObject());
00131                                         break;
00132                                 case JVARRAY:
00133                                         this->deleteArray(this->asArray());
00134                                         break;
00135                                 default:
00136                                         break;
00137                                 }
00138                         };

00297                         static void deleteObject(JsonObject obj)
00298                         {
00299                                 for (JsonObject::iterator it = obj.begin(); it != obj.end(); it++) {
00300                                         delete it->second;
00301                                 }
00302                         };
00303 
00304                         static void deleteArray(JsonArray arr)
00305                         {
00306                                 for (JsonArray::iterator it = arr.begin(); it != arr.end(); it++) {
00307                                         delete *it;
00308                                 }
00309                         };
